example.eg: The water flowed out of the bath.
The flow of the stream carried the water to the lake.
The river has a strong flow and is dangerous.
example.egtrans: 这条河水流湍急，很危险。

example.eg: The flow of the tide carried away the beach chairs.
example.egtrans: 潮水涨了起来，冲走了沙滩椅。

example.eg: The meter measures the flow of water in litres per hour.
example.egtrans: 该仪表以升/小时为单位测量水流量。

example.eg: The project will improve the flow of traffic at this major junction.
example.egtrans: 这项工程可以改善这个主要十字路口的交通状况。

example.eg: The land flowed with everything that was desired.
example.egtrans: 这片土地资源丰富，应有尽有。

example.eg: Traffic flows slowly in this city.
No, that sentence doesn't flow very well.
The whole problem flows from his financial difficulties.
example.egtrans: 整个问题都源自他经济困难。

example.eg: Her hair flowed down her back.
High tide flowed in at around three pm today.
example.egtrans: 今天下午大约三点时涨的潮。

example.eg: I turned on the faucet and water flowed out.
example.egtrans: 我打开水龙头，水就流了出来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 流出, 涌出, 溢出

example.eg: People began flowing out of the building.
The air flow of this oxygen concentrator is 3 liters a minute.
Blockages in the arteries of the leg can cause low blood flow, and pain while walking.
Cash flow can be a problem when you are self-employed.
example.egtrans: 作为自雇人员，现金流可能是个问题。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 现金流转, 现金周转

example.eg: The boats move gently at their moorings in response to the ebb and flow of the tide.
Consumer spending on such products tends to follow the ebb and flow of the economy.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 盛衰，起落, 消长，此起彼伏

dsense.name: flow in
dsense.guideword: figurative (money, ideas, people, etc: come steadily) (人或资金等)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 持续流入, 源源不断地进入

example.eg: Blood flows into the kidneys through the renal artery.
As capital flows into the stock market, the stock price increases.
The flow rate depends on the size of the pipe.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 流量, 流速, 流动率

example.eg: In the training materials, a flowchart of the standard procedure is included.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 流程图, 操作过程图

example.eg: Flowcharts can be used to visualize new algorithms.
example.egtrans: 程序图可使新算法更加具象化。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 顺其自然, 随遇而安
侧向流动检测, 测流抗原测试

example.eg: A heavy menstrual flow can be very difficult for a woman to deal with.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 阻止大量涌入, 阻止流入
